resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete the selected entry? (Cannot be undone)
Are you sure you want to upload all non-uploaded entries?
No network. Please check your data or wifi connection and try again.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected place? (Cannot be undone)
Only proceed if instructed by the authors! Leaving the field empty uses the default value. \n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Here are a few getting started instructions, that will guide you through the features of the program.
When you are done, please restart your phone for the application to start operating.
Note: you can always review your entries and delete if desired and they will look like that:
Remember to review and upload your entries every now and then:
- You can choose to upload anything new with a simple click:
Last but not least, please set your Places:
For privacy reasons, location is stored relatively to those places, so no latitude/longitude is sent to us:
Do not show these getting started screens again.
Thank you for using the TUDelft Logger, developed by Orestis Gartaganis as part of his final MSc. thesis project.

This project aims to study smartphone users\' search and re-finding behaviour. By re-finding we define the tendacy users have to search for similar queries in different browser sessions, retrieving either same or different results.
More info can be found on the webpage:
